title: 360百科，你狠=-=
author: jhf1405175782
txt_content:
今天没事查查MC的生物之类的..【别吐槽我没上wiki
然后查到僵尸猪人...
出现了这个=-= 顿时笑尿
僵尸猪人躺着都中枪233_(:з」∠)_


僵尸猪人居然是...不正常的生物..果然不正常..

replies.author: wdsjwzzz
replies.txt_content: 百度也是这样，也写的是不正常

replies.author: YZC
replies.txt_content: 正常的猪被雷劈了还变异你说正常吗【mc的猪已经不正常了】

replies.author: eyz1993
replies.txt_content:
这个应该是翻译错误。
MC最权威的WiKi是英文原版的那个，其僵尸猪人词条第一段原文：
Zombie Pigmen are neutral mobs that spawn naturally in the Nether, and can also appear rarely in the Overworld either when Lightning strikes within 3-4 blocks of a Pig, or near active Nether Portals. Like wild Wolves, they are not initially hostile, but all Zombie Pigmen in the area will become aggressive and converge on the player if any individual is attacked. This only applies to the player; mobs that provoke Zombie Pigmen will only be attacked by that specific individual.
单词neutral一般译为中性的。即应为：僵尸猪人是通常在地狱生成的中立生物。
或者是：僵尸猪人是一种中立的生物。

replies.author: xiaoxiaoyouzi
replies.txt_content: 我认为正常反而就不对了。。。。

replies.author: 魂梦归他处
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: ljw5520
replies.txt_content: 楼主也是不正常的·水比
